description: Amendments to planning permission dated 22nd April 2022 (RN 22/01420/FULL) for the alterations to the existing third floor roof terrace to include new canopies and installation of new plant equipment, photovoltaic panels and rooflights at main roof level with associated works. Alterations to the existing car parking entrance on Kendall Place and installation of new doors on the Baker Street and George Street frontages. NAMELY, Existing cycle gate to be repaired and retained; Roof terrace landscape amended, accommodating details specifications for planters; Fixed canopies replaced with retractable awning; Double door adjacent to lift lobby, size and design amended. Doors now open inwards; Bifold door added adjacent to Lift 4, replacing single door and 2 windows; Metal balustrade design amended - Proposed external single door omitted, existing window to remain; Fixed canopies replaced with retractable awning (projection of awning shown in dashed line); Rooflight positions amended; PV panel layout amended; Rooflight positions amended; PV panel layout amended; Rooflight positions amended; Secondary office entrance door to be refurbished to match existing with new handles; Fire Exit door elevation amended; Central timber bar on glazed panel omitted; Fixed canopies replaced with retractable awning; Double door size and design amended; Bifold door added, replacing single door and 2 windows; Metal balustrade design revised; Rooflight positions amended; No new sliding cyclist gate; and Existing metal gate to be retained and repaired
